column2: A White Man's Paradise

In 1788, the British Parliament passed the Abolition of Slavery Act which intended to drastically cut down on the international slave trade and to eventually completely eliminate slavery alltogether - As a result, the catholic Anglo-Saxon populace of Tainody, during the final phase of the Franco-British War, already discontent with the primarily protestant and Welsh speaking government on the isle, seized the oppertunity and seceded from the British Empire, declaring the Tainodyn Republic in 1792. With most of the royal navy occupied elsewhere, the young republic managed to topple the island's government and established a segregationist republic of the slave holding elite. With the new Parliament divided between various factions of whom some wish to reclaim the british isles for the angles while others wish to build a white man's nation abroad, the future remains open for Tainody...
Away far west in Tainody...
A Pannonian Capital

Visegrad has served us well in the past: located on a hill overseeing the upper danube, the fort remained a major Slavic stronghold for centuries. However, the surrounding valley is barely able to accomodate for the growing populace and the geography is less than optimal to support a major city. As a result, many in our governemt advocate to relocate furter south to the town of Vacija where the land is more flat and already more populated than in our current capital. Furthermore, its central location would allow us to govern our new territories more effectively as well.
Towars Vacija!
Visegrad has served us well in the past.
The Golden Century

Once the Hegemon of the Middle East, the Mamluk Sultanate stagnated during the late 15th century as Europeans discovered a new route to  India via the Cabo. The foundation of the V-E Suez Canal Company brought new life into the  Sultanate as the canal has resulted in a blooming Indo-Mediterranean Trade. Even overseas the Sultanate established new trade posts that flourish and cultivate the international trade. But this expansion has also brought in new ideas from abroad that threaten the very foundations of the Sultanate itself. Especially cities like Alexandria are heavily influenced by Venice and house large communities of constitutionalists who wish to reform Egypt into a modern nation state. The 18th century was undoubtedly one of prosperity, but it becomes clear that new conflicts start to emerge as the Sultan has to find a balanced approach between appeasing reformers and reactionaries  alike.
May Allah guide us.
The Alexandrian Legation Quarters

With trade flourishing in Alexandria, people from all over come to the city to engage in the commercial activities. The Venetians have a long history in Alexandria and have had their own Legation Quarters for almost three centuries now, but with an increasingly strong presence of Cymrians, French and Germans alike, the demand for the establishment of dedicated Legation Quarters for these foreigners has become rather strong. Establishing such may come at the dismay of the locals and venetians but could prove beneficial in further developing our international position.
They shall have their own quarters in the city.
We need no one but the Venetians.
The Issue of Slavery

Slavery has long been practiced in europe and the islamic world alike. However, in recent years the issue of slavery has caused widespread division in western europe. Countries like Prydain or Spain even fought wars over its abolition with mixed results. Under Venetian Influence, a large part of the populace in Lower Egypt has grown rather dismissive of the continued practice of slavery within the Sultanate. While slavery within most of Egypt proper has fallen out of use, the East African Slave trade remains rather lucrative for us - With our recent reforms, the issue of the matter has been brought before Sultan and a decision over its future has to be made.
Egypt shall join the rest of the civilized world.
It is our God-given right to enslave those heathens.
The Abbasid Coup

After a century of prosperity, the Mamluk elite has failed to see the changing tides. Historians will argue over what caused the downfall of the Sultanate, but most likely a mixture of political stagnation, an entrenched conservative elite, an increasingly polarized populace as well as growing foreign influence have all contributed to the demise of Mamluk Sultanate. The Caliph has launched a coup with the support of the reactionary elements of the mamluk elite, re-establishing the Caliph's authority over the Nile. Following these events, the city of Alexandria seceded from the newly formed Caliphate, creating a new Egyptian Government led by the local Liberals and Christian Minority.
Allahu Akbar!
For a free and modern Egypt!
The Situation in Paraguay

In the aftermath of the chaotic declaration of independence, the majority of the Argentine Viceroyalty has fallen into the hands of the Colombian rebels. What remained of the Loyalists has fled into the territory of the Tawantinsuyu, leaving the provinces of Corrientes and Paraguay in the hands of the provincial government. In Asuncion, the government structure has largely collapsed, leaving the north in the hands of a newly formed Guarani Confederacy with the aim of throwing off the Spanish Yoke  entirely. We have to contain this anarchy and restore the provincial government as soon as possible if we wish to survive these turbolent times.
We shall prevail!
The Future of Paraguay

Having risen through the ranks during the Guarani War, our genral Bernardo Luis de Velasco has used his newly aquired military might to seize the government in Asuncion, officially declaring the independence of the country. A devout Paraguayanist, he has mobilized his troops and invaded the Chaco to secure it for the growing Paraguayan state. His intends are clear: to create a modern nationstate in the north, independent from both the Colombians and Platineans. Yet much works lays ahead of us - the native Guarani may have been defeated but form a large chunk of our population and have proven themselves to fiercly defend their independence. It might be most beneficial to properly integrate them into our newly emerging national identity.
No need to integrate a bunch of jungle dwellers.
The Guarani are an integral part of Paraguay!
The Fall of the Eagle

The Holy Roman Empire as an entity has lasted for a thousand years, acting as a hegemon over most of central and western europe. As much as it acted as a stabilizing force, so has it also brought much hardship and devastation in recent years as regional dukes and bishops lose control over their ever growing urban populace. Feudal structures and the rise of modern industrialism, combined with a weak central authority, economic hardship and deep religious divisions have increasingly destabilized and undermined the empire for centuries, resulting in the emperor becoming nothing more but a weak figurehead. At last has happened what was already well overdue: As Bohemia, the Hansa and Netherlands cut the remaining ties with Munich, the ruling Wittelsbacher see themselves unable to enforce the Imperial Law, unable to keep together a fracturing realm that is no longer meant to last. The princes no longer recognize the authority of the double-headed eagle, effectively rendering the empire void. At last, the true heir of Rome, with it's divine right to rule...
...is an Empire no more.
The Fall of the Realm
The Holy Roman Empire has failed, we shall no longer be slaves to a remote emperor in Munich who cannot control his subjects. Long live the princes!
An Empire no more!
Adopt Standard Italian?

Italy has become linguistically quite diverse since the downfall of the old empire, resulting in various regional tongues being spoken in the many states across the peninsula. With the rise of nationalist sentiment, the calls for a unified language has emerged as well and many have turned towards the Tuscan, albeit a modified variant, to act as the universal Italian language due to it's already prestigeous status. Alternatively, we can disregard the pan-italianists calls and embrace our local tongue instead.
We are all Italians
Disregard their calls
The Nordic Student Movement

Initiated by the students of Lund University in in Scania, the first Scandinavian Student Meeting was held in 1844 with the goal of developing and advancing Scandinavian Nationalism and Liberalism in the Nordic countries. It was attended by students from Uppsala University, Lund University, the University of Copenhagen, Helsinki University and the University of Christiana and was a relatively large success and is seen as a first step towards a united Scandinavia.
Nothing but dreamers.
The 7 days of Stockholm

Sweden is usually seen as we wealthy and stable country, however, in recent years things took a drastic turn. In the aftermath of the Nordic War of 1829, Sweden was forced to recognize Danish control over Götenburg and secede large strips of land along the Swedish-Norwegian border. Furthermore, Danish and Norwegian armies spread havoc throughout Sweden, harming the economy and leaving behind a severely disenfranchised populace. In an attempt to restore order to the post-war country, Sweden has turned into an increasingly autocratic monarchy that sees itself unable to keep a firm grip over the nation. At last, popular discontent has reached an all-time high as liberal revolutionaries called for an armed uprising against the monarchy, resulting in 7 days of steet and barricade fighting in Stockholm that have finally concluded in favor of the government. However, this may very well only be the beginning of something more sinister to come.
Sweden will prevail!
The Swedish Revolution

In the aftermath of the recent uprising in Stockholm, a wave of liberal agitation swept the country and created and increasingly hostile sentiment towards the Swedish monarchy. When an illegal gathering in Stockholm escalated in the aftermath of a police crackdown, much of the city joined the revolt with our troops being forced to pull out. As of right now, royalist militas are engaging in barricade fights throughout Stockholm against the revolutionaries while our troops prepare to invade just outside of the city boundaries. An armed intervention however would result in a high cost of lives and voices within our government have started to call for the King to abdicate and restore authority to a new parliament instead.
For King and Country!
Towards the Republic!
The Swedish Republic

With the constitution ratified, the King officially abdicated and the parliament finally in charge, the time has come to hold the first all-swedish elections since 1829, this time for all citizens of Sweden. While a Danish Intervention seems unlikely, it would be wise to prepare for the worst as our neighbours will likely attempt to restore the monarchy to Sweden.
The North shall be free!
The Czecho-German Conflict

In the aftermath of the Hussite wars, the heretical christian sects were eradicated for the most part and Bohemia enjoyed three centuries of stability thanks to the unifying catholic faith of the populace. In recent times however, a visible shift seems to have occurred as people become increasingly aware of the linguistic divide in our country. The German speaking populace of the Sudetenland and Silesia becomes more dissatisfied with the Czech dominated government in Prague while many Czechs see the unity of the realm threatened by possible secessionist groups in Eger and Breslau. A cultural rift is starting to emerge which will have to be overcome if Bohemia wants to last.
Bohemia is indivisible!
Czech Nationalism Intensifies
Recently nationalist and ethnic agitation has spiked in the Czech lands of Bohemia, causing widespread dissatisfaction with the current situation.
Bohemia is indivisible!
German Nationalism Intensifies

Influenced by recent events elsewhere in Germany, nationalist agitation in the German lands of Bohemia has intensified, causing separatist sentiment to arise due to the Czech dominated government in Prague. Especially among the Silesians is there a strong demand for German to be recognized as the official language of the Crown to ensure the cultural autonomy of Silesia and stronger ties with the rest of Germany at the cost of our Pannonian lands.
They'll be Czechs in no time.
Perhaps we should consider a language reform.
The Rise of Moravianism

Great Moravia was a union of various slavic entities that existed in what is today part of Moravia and Pannonia. Formed from the ruins of the first Avar Khaganate, Great Moravia dominated Bohemia and the Carpathian basin throughout the 9th century before disintegrating in the middle of the 10th century. While the Slavs of Moravia have long since evolved into the modern Czechs, Slovaks and Avars, the idea of a reunited Slovincian nation has recently gained traction as promiment patriotic clubs have sprung up from Praha to Vyšehrad to promote this Great Moravian Nationalism.
Nothing more but dreamers
The Crown of Bohemia

The Crown of Bohemia is arguably the hegemon of central europe and the main rival to the Wittelsbacher Empire. Following the the Hussite Wars in the 15th century, the current Rosenberg Dynasty of Bohemia firmly consolidated the Silesian and Lusatian Duchies and has greatly expanded the Bohemian realm to include much of Pannonia. Recently however, with the advent of nationalist sentiment following the Spanish Revolution, a rift appeared within Bohemia between the Czech lands of Bohemia-Moravia and the German Sudetes and Silesia. Furthermore, the politics of the Holy Roman Empire leave most of our domains in Pannonia outside our effective control and in the hands of the regional nobility, undermining the cohesion of the realm. In time we'll have to make a decision about the future of the Crown if we wish to preserve the Bohemian Hegemony.
A Bohemian will never bow to a Wittelsbach
Bohemia was always integral to the Empire
The Time of Hojo

When the Mongols first landed in 1274, they barely managed to hold onto the island of Kyushu, frequently dealing with local uprisings. It was with the on the onset of the Sengoku period, that the Mongols sweeped through Japan, depopulating the isles and breaking clans amidst the chaos. The Fall of Kyoto marked the end of the Imperial State of Japan, giving rise to the Kyoto Khanate in its place. A last ditch effort led by the great Hojo Clan managed to avoid the complete conquest of Japan, but left much of Japan in Mongol hands. However, the demise of the Tokugawa asserted the Hojo as the sole legitimate ruler this final rump state and as the Kyoto Khanate further disintegrates into tribal rivalries, we muster our strength in the north, preparing for the reconquest of our homeland.
The Shogun will restore order in the south!
The Unification of the Ainu
At last the Ainu are being reunited into a single entity. Long live the Jomon!
Finally
The Rise of Silesian Nationalism

Due to the recent increase of nationalist sentiment across much of europe, the historically ethnically mixed region of Silesia saw an increase in ethnic tensions as Upper Silesians increasingly identify as Poles and consider themselves alienated by our administration. Likewise, Lower Silesians increasingly embrace a German identity and enactes a series of local initiatives of fully germanize the rest of Silesia. Either way, a cultural divide has emerged in Silesia, one that might cause more serious issues in the future.
Schlaesinger or Slunzoki, they're one and the same
The Teutonic Knighthood

In the 1440's, a series of Prussian cities and bishoprics had united against the arbitrariness of the Teutonic Knighthood and by 1454 had launched a rebellion against the Teutonic State which saw the establishment of Hanseatic Hegemony over the Baltics following their intervention into the Prussian War. Ever since, Danzig served as the capital and primary hub of the region, serving as the power basis from which the Hanseatic League governs Prussia. But the Knights were not abolished as an entity following their defeat - While they initially kept many of their lands around Marienburg, their center eventually shifted towards Königsberg from where the reactionary Knighthood operates to this day, constantly undermining the Prussian Confederation. With the recent rise of the Livonian Brotherhood, it is only a matter of time before the Teutons attempt to seize power in Prussia as well, hence why we must contain them once and for all.
And so we shall
The Knighthood Contained

Our attempts at limiting the knighthood were successful - we have seized their remaining lands in Prussia and elimated their reactionary influence of the better - The Confederation has prevailed! However, the issue of the Baltic Collapse and the steady decline of the Hanseatic League are the primary reasons why the knighthood become an issue in the first place - perhaps it is time to cut ties with the League and establish ourselves as an independent democratic state based on the ideals of the Spanish Revolution?
We will always stay with our Hanseatic Allies!
Libertad, Igualdad, Fraternidad!
The Knights Rise Up!

Our failure to contain the Knights has finally resulted in the worst case scenario: The Teutonic State has seized Königsberg and the Memelland, as well as the territories of Kulm and Masuria. While Confederate troops managed to hold onto the Ermland, Pomerelle and Danzig itself, the situation appears bleak. The Confederation does not have the means to defeat the Teutonic State and aid from the League seems unlikely, thus many in the Danziger Hansetag have put forth the idea of capitulating outright before the situation escalates into civil war.
And so end four centuries of freedom...
We will not submit without a fight!
The Second Prussian War
The Knights have begun their offensive and war is inevitable now. Prussia is at war once more...
For the League!
Deus Vult!
The Prussians Secede!

We have received note that the Prussians have cut all ties to the League and established their own state independent from the Union. While clearly an act of treason, we don't have the means to enforce our will right now, thus many in the Hansetag have proposed to simply let them go.
For the better.
Prussia will always be Hanseatic!
The Precarious State of the Baltics

Formed in the 15th century in the aftermath of the War of the Prussian Confederation, the former Livonian State was incorported into the Hanseatic League to become the United Baltic Lands. A confederation of the Livonian Knights, various Bishoprics as well as the German and Lithuanian Nobility, this patchwork of various states is dominated by the Hanseatic city of Riga. While the liberal minded merchants of Riga promote the idea of a Federal Union, the recent rise of nationalist sentiment has periodically led to Lithuanian revolts. Most recently, we have received word of the Polish government supporting the Kaunas Nobility against our rule and should it not be dealt with soon, this could have serious repercussions for the League.
We will deal with the traitors.
The Cherkess Unification
With the rise of our neighbour to a status of Hegemon, they have initiated steps to centralize Cherkessia into a single nation.
Long live Cherkessia!
The Royal Election of $YEAR$

Poland has been an elective monarchy since the 16th century, meaning that the Polish nobility usually elects a new king upon the death or abdication of the previous one from among various european candidates. This unique arangement has kept Poland from succession wars born out of hereditary issues, but has also led to the country being easily influenced by outside powers. Since the mid 18th century, Poland has was traditionally ruled by members of the Wettin Dynasty of Saxony who greatly stabilized and enhanced the territory of the Polish Kingdom. Recent revolutionary developments in the West however have made the Sejm sceptical and worried that a Saxon Monarch could pull Poland into an undesired war in Western Europe. Thus a alternative proposal of electing a local Polish noble as King has become pretty attractive within a large faction of the Sejm.
The House of Wettin will keep Poland great!
Maybe we should consider a local alternative...
The Royal Election of $YEAR$

With the ideas of revolution and nationalism spreading throughout Western Europe, it was only a matter of time for it to reach Poland as well. The previous decade has seen the rise and spread of Pan-Slavic Nationalism throughout much of the Kingdom. The Wettins have done a great job at ruling Poland in the past, thus many in the Sejm consider electing another Saxon King to keep the multi-ethnic character of our Kingdom. However, with Poland including much of Ruthenia, the election of a Polish noble to solidify and expand upon the Polish-Ruthenian Pan-Slavic ethos to strengthen our country seems reasonable as well. Alternatively, there have beeen new forces advocating for the election of a Bohemian King and for the development of a West-Slavic Nationalism specifically to further the polonization of the East.
The House of Wettin will rule Poland once more.
A local will do just fine.
A Bohemian King will lead us to Zapadoslavia!
The Royal Election of $YEAR$

Recent developments in our country have led to an increased polarization between Poles and Ruthenians, leaving our country potentially weak and unstable. With this year's Kingly Election, two candidates have been brought forward: A Polish and a Ruthenian Noble. Having a Polish King would most likely agitate the Ruthenian Lands further but greatly speed up the process of Polonization. Alternatively, a Ruthenian Noble would appease the eastern Peasantry and Nobility at the cost of Polish nationalists at home who could potentially start undermining the Sejm alltogether.
We need a Polish King!
We need a Ruthenian King!
The Royal Election of $YEAR$

The turmoil and instability of the past century seem to have gone by at last and our country stands united. Despite the death of our beloved King, Poland and Ruthenia stand united under a single flag with people from both nations already celebrating this years' election of a Polish-Ruthenian King who will lead our country into a prosperous future.
The Commonwealth stands united.
The Formation of the Commonwealth
Recent Developments in the Kingdom have resulted in the formation of the Polish-Ruthenian Commonwealth, effectively integrating our country into the new Union.
So be it
The Port of Chadzybej

A decade has passed since we first initiated the construction of Chadzybej - What was initially a Moldovan fishing village of some 1500 people has grown to include varios industries and peoples from all over europe, creating a unique regional culture that integrated German, Italian, Ruthenian, Tatar and Polish elements. Having become a major sea port on the black sea coast, the town will serve as a major economic hub of our country and is only expected to grow further in the future.
A full success.
The Maratha Conspiracy

Ever since the fall of the Ahmadnagar Sultanate has the majority of Maharashtra been ruled by the Deccani Sultans of Bijapur. However, while nominally part of the Bijapuri Sultanate, the Maratha Caste has retained many privileges and a large degree of autonomy, especially in Nagpur and Bombay. Due to this situation, the Sultan holds little influence over his northern possessions and the Maratha are fully aware of that, steadily undermining the Sultan's authority to expand their own control over the region. Even while under foreign rule, the Maratha stand united.
Our time will come.
The Unification of the Maratha

The Maratha of Bombay put forth a proposal to enter into a confederacy to undermine the Sultan's authority. If we decline, we run risk of being subdued by the Bijapuri, accepting however would mean submitting to the Bombayi Maratha.
For the Maratha!
For the Sultan!
Growing Maratha Influence

Since the conquest of the Ahmadnagar Sultanate we've had trouble keeping a firm hold on the area. In order to exert any sort of authority and to avoid any revolts, the Maratha were given a large degree of autonomy to deal with their own affairs, allowing us to more efficiently administer our core territory without having to worry about a potential civil war. However, this seems to have backfired now as the Maratha have entered into a coalition and have begun to actively disobey any directives from Bijapur!
We should've never trusted these fools.
The Occupation of Bombay

The Sultan has sent an army to our capital in an attempt to revoke our autonomous status and assert his direct rule over the whole region. Poona has already fallen to the Sultan's army - However, in Bombay the local Maratha have refused to surrender and tensions are boiling throughout the city. Submitting to the invading force would mean giving up our independence. But lucky for us, their troops are spread out throughout the city and can easily be overwhelmed if we act swiftly. How should we proceed?
Kill every last one of them!
We had a good run...
The Bombay Massacre!

My Sultan! News have reached us that the Maratha have refused to submit and have killed our troops that were sent to pacify the city. This is the final insult and a clear act of rebellion. We have to prepare for the worst.
Mobilize the army!
The Maratha Revolt

In the aftermath of Fall of the Ahmadnagar Sultanate, the area has effectively fallen into the hands of the Maratha Caste who were initially loyal subjects of the new Bijapuri Sultans. However, following centuries of autonomy, decentralization, weak governance and conspiracy, the Maratha have managed to take effective control over most of Maharashtra, creating a parallel government in Bombay, independent from Bijapur. With tensions escalating recently when the Sultan attempted to assert his authority over the north, the Maratha Confederacy has declared an open revolt, forming the Maratha Empire in the process.
We go to war!
The Maratha Confederacy

Thanks to our efforts to unite the Maratha Caste we have finally managed to unite the majority behind us in a single confederacy. This should severely undermine the Sultan's efficiency in administrating Maharashtra and put us in a more favorable position to enforce our demands at will.
The Age of the Maratha has begun.
The Decline of Persia

In the aftermath of the Safavid's collapse, Iran was divided between various Kurdish, Turkmen and Persian dynasties all fighting for the control of the former imperial territory. In these times, Afghanistan enjoyed a brief period of independence but by 1766 the Turkmen Hajilarids of Khorasan have managed to reunite the Safavid's former empire, extending their rule over much of Afghanistan as well. However, in recent years the constant wars against the Rûm have left the empire weakened and decentralized. A man by the name of Iqbal Nazari has used this oppertunity to unite the Pashtos of Kandahar and Pashtunistan under a single banner and is now preparing a potential uprising against Hajilarid Rule.
Afghanistan shall be free once more
The Nazarid Revolt

Afghanistan has been part of the Iranian Empires since the Safavid Era but has proven itself to be an extremely rebellious region. While the usually rebellious region of Kandahar has largely been quiet since the rise of the Sunni Hajilarid Dynasty, recent wars in the West against the rising Shahdom of Rûm has left much of Pashtunistan de facto independent. To our misfortune, this has now led to the rise of a new Pashto Dynasty under a man called Iqbal Nazari. We must restore order in the east swiftly before more regions threaten to secede from the empire.
That backwater is not worth a potential civil war.
For the unity of Iran!
The End of the Nazarid Revolt

With the fall of the last Nazarid Stronghold, all of Afghanistan has once again been subdued and reintegrated into Iran. In spite of this, we retain our de facto independence and while officially part of the empire, it is only a matter of time before another disaster strikes the central authority and we get out second chance at gaining independence.
Soon we will be free once more
The Occupation of Peshawar

With our troops occupied in the west, the backstabbing Sikhs have taken their oppertunity and occupied Peshawar - while clearly an act of war, the Sikhs do not seem interested in any further territorial conquests into our lands. Redirecting our troops back to the east to retake the area would escalate the conflict and put us in a two-front war. How should we procede?
We will reclaim it in the future.
With Allah on our side, no one can defeat us!
Nazarid Takeover!
As Persia declines, Afghanistan is once more trying to regain its independence. Local loyalists of a man called Nazari have taken over the region and voiced their support for the Afghan Dynasty.
It is for the best of the country...
The Fall of the Hajilarids

For almost seven decades have the Hajilarids held hegemony over most of greater Iran and Iraq, bringing peace and stability to a region that was has been in anarchy for almost a century following the demise of the Safavids. However, the recent loss of Iraq to the Rûm as well as various uprisings throughout the empire such as the Nazirid Revolt have left the empire weak and destabilized. Increasing discontent from the largely shiite population has finally sparked the downfall of the empire as the administration in Khorasan and Fars has completely failed. In Sari, a provisional Tabaristani government has declared formed an independent republic - in Isfahan, a local Persian Dynasty has taken over and seized much of Fars and Kerman. The remaining territories have fallen to various rebel groups with the remnants of the Hajilarids retreating into Turkmenia proper. What the future holds for Iran is unknown...
The Hajilarids will rise once more!
Mazanderan shall become a model for all of Iran!
Fars will reunite Iran and lead it to glory!
The Morelian Constitutional Convention

Months have passed since the initial declaration of independence. Our Colombian allies have made great gains further to the south, taking effective control of the whole Quitan Governate. However, our situation remains precarious - a lack of Colombian aid has allowed for Spanish Invasion to take place in the Gio Grande Territory and it becomes increasingly clear that we cannot count on their aid anytime soon. Tasked with formulating a provisional constitution, the matter of our future status remains unclear. Initially the whole of New Spain was to become a constituent part of the Colombian Republic, but recent developments have shown that Caracas won't be able to directly aid us in our struggles, thus many within the Conservative Wing proposed the formation of an independent Tarascan Republic instead. However, many within the Liberal Wing call for the unity of all Colombians and urge everyone to stay loyal to the revolution. The matter is up for the vote and ...
... we stand with Caracas!
... the Tarascan Republic is declared!
The Yucatan Republic sends its delegation

The Yucatec Territory has been in anarchy ever since the initial declaration of independence. The power struggle within the area has finally come to an end however and republican troops have successfully taken control of the whole region. In the aftermath of the Yucatecan Revolution, a delegation was sent to Morelia to participate in the upcoming constitutional convention and to negotiate the future borders of the Yucatec State within our territory.
We shall welcome them with open arms!
The Yucatec Revolution

When both the Captaincy of Guatemala and the Viceroyalty of New Spain seceded from Spain, the area of Yucatan had effectively fallen into anarchy. Republican troops from Morelia had entered the territory by late december, joining the struggle between the regional Spanish government and local Mayan warlords. By now peace has largely returned to the territory with the Spanish government being no more. In its place rises a new...
Yucatec Republic!
Mayan State!
The Duchy of Brittany

Brittany has been under French dominion for over 250 years now, however, with most of France in chaos, the local Breton elite has decided to take matters into their own hands and temporarily seceded from the rest of the country. As of right now, anti-revolutionary sentiment is widespread throughout Nantes with reactionaries demanding the Duke to support the French monarch in his struggle against the republicans. However, with Breton nationalism at an all-time high, there have been calls by the liberals to abolish the Duchy alltogether and to declare a Breton Republic, to completely cut ties with the rest of the country.
Declare the Breton Republic!
We shall not cut ties with our French brothers!
A Land across the Sea.

The Viceroyalty of New Cambria, commonly known as Avalon, was established in 1712 when the colonies of Afalon and Elmet were united under a single administration. Since then the United Colonies have gradually grown and come to include lands such as those of Dyfed and Albama - However, the recent Franco-British war left much of North America devastated. While Avalon has largely been spared, increased taxation as well as revolts in the lands of Llyn Mawr have led to an increase in Anti-Colonial Sentiment, further reinforced by the completece secession of the Spanish colonies to the south. An increase in border conflicts with the German colonies to the North has furthermore caused the people abandon faith in the Cymrian administration and if not addressed soon, a conflict will most likely arise between the colonies and home isles. Either way, the future of Avalon remains open.
Avalon's time will come.
La Renaixença

Free from the Spanish yoke, it is now time to decide the future of our nation. The first matter at hand should be the selection of a suited capital. Historically Barcelona served as such and would keep us politically closer to our French liberators but would greatly upset the Aragonese. The city of Zaragoza within the historical region of Aragon would make for an excellent alternative and would underline our independence from France as a sovereign nation. However, this could greatly upset the Catalans in return. A final option would be Valencia which would be most beneficial due to its large port and location - furthermore the area around Valencia was historically heavily mixed between Catalans and Aragonese and would thus be a compromise between both, however, these days the city houses a large Spanish minority and we would run risk of falling back into the Spanish sphere in the long run. Whichever we pick will decide the future course of our country.
We are Aragonese first and foremost. Zaragoza is our natural capital.
Few are more prestigous than the Catalans. Barcelona is our natural capital.
Aragon is a country of commerce and equals. Valencia is our natural capital.
The Lithuanian Duchy

Formed in 1236, the Grand Duchy of Lithuania played a major role in the Baltics and Eastern Europe prior to its subjugation in 1384. Seen by many as the birthplace of Baltic nationalism, the Duchy has always been troublesome for the Baltenland administration - while de jure a part of the League's territory, the Lithuanian nobility has effectively been ruling the land independently for centuries now. Only minimal cooperation exists with the central government in Riga and any attempts to establish a proper administration in the area has historically only led to the Lithuanian Uprisings of 1401, 1449, 1521 and 1730. As the Baltic authority continues to decline and Polish influence grows in the area, local nobles have now effectively seceded from the territory entirely, hoping to gain their full independence with Polish aid. If we fail to restore order in the south, the situation could quickly spiral out of control.
The Baltics shall remain united.
The Balts shall be liberated. Onwards as Lithuania!
The Livonian Order

The Livonian Brothers of the Sword are one of the most influential groups within the Baltenland. A military order that is responsible for the subjugation of the Letts, Ests and Kurs, the Livonians have largely been assimilated into the Teutonic Order by the 15th century. However, following the war of the Prussian Confederation and the subjugation of the Teutonic Knights by the Hanseatic League, the Livonian Order has been reformed in the aftermath of the formation of the Baltenland. While the knights historically haven't caused much trouble, the recent loss of the Lithuanian Duchy has allowed for the conservative and reactionary knighthood to once more establish their authority throughout much of the territory on the pretext of preserving German rule over the area. We must act soon and put a final end to the knights if we wish to preserve the league.
We will prevail.
The Knights will preserve what is left. Onwards as Livonia!
The Baltic Collapse

Rising tensions throughout the territory and a strong decline of the central authority in Riga has long troubled the Hanse's Baltic lands. What started as an act of defiance by the local Lithuanian nobility has quickly spiraled into the complete disintegration of the Baltenland as Livonian Knights and Lithuanian Nobles assert their rule throughout the land, effectively putting an end to centuries of Hanseatic Rule. While the city of Riga manages to fight off the Livonian's attempts to assert their rule, the Baltenland has now effectively seized to exist, leaving the Baltics in the hands of the local rulers.
From Riga we shall rise once more!
The Cours will reform a new Duchy. Onwards as Courland!
The Letts will unite the Balts. Onwards as Latgale!
The Ests will reform a new League. Onwards as Estonia!
The Future of Riga

The Baltic League is no more. In its place now stand the Lithuania Duchy, the Livonian Order and the Rigan Republic. Unlike the first two however, Riga is no more than a mere city state with only limited influence and power. While it is the largest city of the area, without Hanseatic aid it is unlikely that it will withstand the Livonian Knights for long. Alternatively, submitting to the Knighthood will cause tensions with the Hanseatic League in the future. Hence two camps have emerged, each favouring either the reactionary Knighthood or the liberal League. Alternatively we can try to form our own fate as an independent city state and a free republic of the Baltic. The decision is up to the Rigan Council.
The Pearl of the Baltic shall be independent and free for evermore!
We must reunite with our Livonian Brothers!
Riga shall prosper with the Hanseatic League!
The Decline of Kyoto

The Khanate of Kyoto has enjoyed a long period of peace and prosperity for the past five centuries, having been an extremely attractive place for Chinese refugees ever since the collapse of the Yuan. Being a last remnant of the Mongol Empire, Kyoto has endured despite never ending raids and subjugation attempts. The arrival of the Europeans however has changed many things as new ideas start to spread throughout the Khanate. The traditional openess of the Khans towards outsiders seems to have turned against them now as the ideas of the Enlightenment start to become popular amongst the Tunghai while the disenfranchised Japanese start to adopt a more nationalist sentiment against the Khanate. Increasde Manchu and Japanese raids alike have led to an increased autonomy of the provinces as the central authority fails to protect its domain. If kept unadressed, these problems might very well bring about the final demise of Kublai Khan's Empire.
Dschinghis's Empire shall never fall!
Manuel Xosé Arce's Government

When the Central American Partisan War began, Manuel Xosé Arce was just one of many regional militia leaders fighting against the Spanish. While initially just a minor insurgency which's future would have been one of tragedy, the sudden rise of revolutionary sentiment across the Americas has enabled Arce to effectively take control over most of Central America. However, unlike most other revolutionaries, he stands strongly opposed to the Pan-Colombian dream, instead fighting for a united Central American Federation. This stance has caused a lot of tensions in the liberal dominated national assembly, eventually resulting in the December Coup of 1835. Unable to hold onto power, he gathered his followers and set up an exile government in San Xosé, the Regional Borucan Government for the Liberation of Central America, ready to march north to seize control once more.
For Central America!
This insanity ends now - down with Arce! Long live Colombia!
This insanity ends now - down with Arce! Long live Boruca!
The Future of Belize

When Spanish authority collapsed, many regional militia leaders managed to seize large chunks of lands for themselves, forming their own little kingdoms or republics. While the Belizean army was an ally during the Partisan Wars, they refused to join Arce's government once the Spanish yoke was overthrown. The political instability that followed after Arce fled south has kept us from establishing a proper government in the break-away region - however, now that the Insurgency has been dealt with, it is time to bring them into the fold.
To war!
Let's negotiate with them.
They are not worth it. Recognize their Independence!
The Future of Belize

The Central American Government has offered us terms under which Belize would effectively join the Union as another separate province. While loosing our independence, declining the offer would certainly mean war. How shall we react?
We have no choice...
To war!
The Collapse of Arce's Government!

The division of the country comes to an end as Arce is overthrown by a local pro-federal coup. The takeover of Xosé Rafael de Gallegos y Alvarado has reformed the Borucan Republic into a regional province once more, eagerly awaiting reintegration into the union once more.
Hurrah!
The Borucan Declaration of Independence!

Arce's Government has been overthrown by a regionalist coup! The new Borucan government refuses to recognize federal authority and has revoked all claims on our land. Their secession seriously threatens the integrity of our nation.
For the integrity of the republic!
They are not worth it. Recognize their Independence!
The War for Central America

When the Central American Partisan War began, Manuel Xosé Arce was just one of many regional militia leaders fighting against the Spanish. While initially just a minor insurgency which's future would have been one of tragedy, the sudden rise of revolutionary sentiment across the Americas has enabled Arce to effectively take control over most of Central America. However, unlike most other revolutionaries, he stood strongly opposed to the Pan-Colombian dream, instead attempting to solidify his own rule in Centróamerica. His unpopularity in the assembly has thus resulted in a coup last December, causing him to flee to San Xosé. Francisco Morazán has temporarily assumed emergency powers to deal with Arce's government and the Miskito Insurgency that occurred following his removal from office. The country stands divided and on the brink of civil war as both sides claim to be the rightful government of the region.
For the Federal Republic!
The Great Migration

Our homeland has been devastated. The brutal nature of the Russian incursions left many towns and villages in ruins, whole families were eradicated. As a result, many people started to flee from the advancing Russian hordes into a new land south. However, only few are willing to settle in the cold and dry steppes of the Oirats and Kazakhs. Under the leadership of a new great khan, referred to as the Zöld Khan, many people have instead started to head west towards the Polish lands, settling in a strip of land along the black sea to build themselves a new homeland there. We have to choose which area would be more suitable for our people and a safe future.
The Urals will always be our home!
The Green Khan will lead us into a new homeland!
The Conquest of the Tyumen

The Conquest of the Bashkirs has finally opened up a route to the rest of Siberia. With the integration of the Ugrics of the north, the time has now come to subdue the Khanate of Sibir. Once subdued, the rest of the siberian wastes should easily be conquered by our cossacks!
Let's civilize those savages!
We have other fronts to attend to first.
The Tatar Genocide

Following the subjugation of the north-western Tartary, many russians flocked into the newly conquered lands, setting up colonies and towns to solidify these territories. While the initial conquest by the cossacks was brutal enough in its own right, leaving many native villages deserted and many people displaced, the recent reports from the larger Idel-Ural region describe scenes of true horror. What started as a minor administrative reform based on demographics quickly escalated into mass deportations and outright genocide. While the upper volga region seems to have only been minorly affected, the mass disappearance of Magyar and Sybyrlar communities alike has led to widespread concerns amongst the international community. There have been reports of bodies appearing along the Volga shores as far south as Tsaritsyn, confirming the worst fears of many. The Magyars who fled decades ago are indeed to be considered the lucky ones as those who stayed behind have now been nearly eradicated in this widespread ethnic cleansing, permanently changing the Idel-Ural area for better or worse...
The Tatar Yoke is broken once and for all!
The War of the Five Kingdoms!

Zhou authority has been in decline for the past few centuries now. While it was expected that the Zhou would not be able to hold onto power for too long, nobody expected the fracturing to be this severe. As the Manchu reform the former state of Qing, the peoples rally to the banner of the Tungning Ming once more, eager to restore the prestigious former dynasty. However, at the same time people are rallying to the banner of the Great Yue who promise the establishment of a new dynasty never seen before in Chinese history. As anarchy reigns supreme in the west, the Hui of Qinghai and Gansu rally under the banner of the Hui dynasty, promising to claim the mandate for the faithful. Dzungars, Khoshuts and Khalkas all secede from the Chinese Empire as a final Zhou remnant is left on its own to restore order in the far east.
The War for the Mandate has begun
The Fall of the Southern Ming!

Many centuries have passed since Zhu Youlang crossed the border into Burma, narrowly escaping the armies of the Qing. The Qing's failure to capture Zhu gave him the opportunity to set up a rump state in the area around Ava, solidifying his rule over the fertile valley. Serving as a base of operation, the Qing would eventually be defeated by the Three Feudatories, however, Wu Sangui's desire for the Mandate caused him to betray the rightful Ming, leaving us isolated in Burma. The increase of Shan raids into our territory as well as the unpopular standing of the Ming has now led to the final straw as the Bamar dispose the rightful Ming Emperor, restoring the old Kingdom of Ava.
The Bamar are free once more!
The Last Habsburg

Otto XII has died in a hunting accident a few days ago at the young age of 21. Without an heir, his death marks the end of the Habsburg dynasty, a dynasty that has ruled the duchy of austria for seven centuries. Due to the Vienna Pact, the duchy would supposedly be inherited by the Bavarian King, however due to the recent events in the Netherlands and Spain, the Bavarian King has instead granted the title to us. While this is certainly a moment to rejoice for us, it also a moment to mourn as the Habsburgs with their long history have finally come to an end. While their history is fascinating and it is interesting to think what could have been, they will ultimately be forgotten as their only stronghold gets inherited by the Styrians, the true rulers of all eastern marches.
Es lebe Steiermark!
Death of the Pannonian Duke!

With the death of our duke, our duchy would legitimately pass on to the duchy Avaria, resulting in us loosing our unique autonomy under the Bohemian Crown. If we don't intervene, Lower Pannonia will become an integral part of the Avarian Duchy!
We have to abide by the law.
Declare the Balaton Republic!
The Pannonian Inheritance

The pannonian duke has died without an heir, resulting in the avarian duke inheriting the title. Despite the new duke's unpopularity within the lower pannonian duchy, especially amongst the pannonian nobility, there has been little to no resistance to the change. While this change is widely welcomed by the Avars, this is most certainly a worrying development for the Bohemians as well as the various minorities living within pannonia who had enjoyed great autonomy under the former duke. Whatever the future holds for the area, one thing is certain: after almost seven centuries, the two Avarian Duchies have finally been reunited under a single Avarian ruler, creating a rivaling power to the Bohemian authority within the basin..
Konecne dohromady!
The Balaton Republic

The pannonian duke has died without an heir, resulting in the avarian duke inheriting the title. Despite this however, the Pannonian nobility has gathered the regional parliament and declared the Balaton Republic, officially seceding from the Bohemian Crown. While it is unlikely that the Balatonese can hold their ground against the overwhelming force of the bohemian army, they would rather go down fighting for their independence than give up the autonomy and freedom they have enjoyed for the past few centuries.
Crush this revolt!
Let them go...
Collapse of the Ionian League!

The republican government in Morea has failed to usurp the despotate. Without the foreigners backing the revolution and without the morean army, the chances of our survival are slim. It is now upon us to liberate all of Greece from the the autocrats.
Long live the Hellenic Republic!
The Irish Question

Iwerddon, also known as Ireland, has been subjugated many centuries ago. However, the various Irish Clans still persist throughout the isle, rendering our administration in many regions de facto obscure. If we want to integrate Ireland, we have to break these clans and remove all their privileges or alternatively set up an Irish Dominion that would rule the island on our behalf through a Cymro-Irish administration.
They are better off under us.
Set up a Dominion.
The British Demands

The British Government has put forth a series of demands to our administration that would effectively put all of Ireland under direct rule from Caerloyw. While outrageous, we have little to no means to resist them...
We rather go down fighting those darn Brits
Very well, we have no choice.
The Irish Revolt!
Our demands have fallen upon deaf ears and sparked an unprecedented act of defiance towards the crown. The Irish have declared their independence and cut all ties to the Kingdom!
We'll teach them a lesson. Prepare the fleet!
Let them go, they are of no value.
The Belgian Revolution

My Emperor! Our subjects in the Low Countries have revolted against our rule and proclaimed the United States of the Netherlands in Brussels! We have effectively lost control over our holdings in the area and now face another serious issue within the Empire. If we fail to restore order to the Netherlands soon, this might lead to only more trouble in the future.
We will prepare a response
The Belgian Revolution

The Revolution has come! The Holy Roman Empire has become weak and the Emperor has lost his authority. The preceding Republic of Liége has shown the people of the Low Countries that the Emperor is unable to keep his realm together and that he holds no authority in the Netherlands. The entire Empire is rotten to the core and a symbol of the ancient regime, a federation of autocratic and feudal states, ruled by selfish nobles without any morals or remorse. However, this day marks the beginning of the end for this failure of a state. The Black, Red and Golden banner will fly above the whole of Germany and the Feudal states will be dissolved once and for all.
Für Einigkeit und Recht und Freiheit
Join the Netherlandish States?
The government in Brussels has invited us to join a federation of equals to better resist any foreign attempts at dissolving our government. How should we respond?
United we stand
We are better off on our own!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ joins the Republic!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has accepted our offer to join our Republic. This will certainly strengthen our position.
Hurrah!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has refused!
$FROMCOUNTRY$ has decided to maintain their full independence. We will see how long they will last on their own..
Such a shame.
The Occupation of Andorra
The Spaniards have sent us an ultimatum to submit to their government. What should we do?
We have no chance of winning against them ...
We shall defend our independence!
The Occupation of Andorra

Your Highness, we have been informed that the Spanish have sent an ultimatum to Andorra, demanding their complete annexation. Already have Republican troops occupied the small country and for all we know, they are probably preparing a full blown invasion of our kingdom! We must strike first and put an end to this revolutionary madness, restore the Spanish Kingdom and strike this tumour at its core before it's too late.
Let's put an end to this republican chaos!
Andorra is not worth a war with Spain
The Occupation of Andorra
The Andorrans have refused to submit to our authority. What should we do?
Let's put an end to this feudal autocracy!
Andorra is not worth a war
The Parisian Riots

The Age of Absolutism is coming to an end. Feudalism is becoming obsolete as the Industrial Revolution spreads across Europe. However, many regimes are unable to adapt, fail to reform themselves to fit into this new age. While France managed to remain relatively stable, this seems to become increasingly difficult as liberal and nationalist agitation leads to widespread unrest in our kingdom. The fall of the Spanish Empire has shown to all of Europe that if not kept in check, this sentiment will lead to anarchy and chaos. We are now facing an immediate danger in our very own capital, Paris, as enraged peasants and craftsman parade through the streets and harass priests and nobles alike. Reports of violence have become more common, and if we fail to contain this soon, we might face a serious crisis not just in Spain, but at home as well..
Noted
The Fall of the Bastille!

My King! We have received terrible news - Our final stronghold in central Paris, the Bastille, has fallen to the revolutionary crowds. At this point, most of our troops have already been withdrawn from the central districts of the city, instead taking up position at strategic locations around Paris. The troops left behind have either been killed or deserted to the rioters. While we have secured the immediate area around Paris and increased our presence at Versaille, with the fall of the prison the revolutionaries are now armed and more dangerous than before, ready to advance against our troops. We must put down this revolt or otherwise our beloved kingdom will fall to the same republican chaos that has already engulfed Spain..
A Civil War seems all but inevitable now..
Anarchy in Paris

The situation in Paris continues to deteriorate. The outbreak of violence against our troops and officials has left much of the city in disarray and anarchy as our men are being driven out of Paris. We have managed to secure all important locations across the city, reaching from armories to prisons, however, it remains to be seen how long our troops can withstand a prolonged siege. Furthermore it has come to our attention that members of the third estate have formed a so-called "National Assembly", effectively establishing their rule over the city and laying the outrageous claim to speak in the name of all our subjects. They have managed to organize the rioters under their rule and have now put forth a series of demands reaching from a free press to recognition of the assembly as the new national parliament. How should we respond to these recent events?
We shall negotiate with the rioters.
We shall answer their demands with gunpowder and bullets.
The French Revolution of $YEAR$

What need do we have of discussion when everyone is in agreement? Kings are as much monsters in the moral order as in the physical order. The Courts are a workshop for crime, the foyer for corruption and the den of tyrants. The history of kings is the martyrology of nations! - The National Assembly has passed the proclamation of the abolition of the monarchy, officially proclaiming the French Republic. The country is deeply divided and on the brink of civil war ...
Vive la révolution!
Pour le roi et le pays!
The French Civil War

Paris has fallen. The National Assembly has declared the Republic and is now rallying troops to advance against the monarchists who have fled the city. The nobility and clergy have sided with the royalists, mobilizing their own forces in an attempt to contain the republican uprising. Meanwhile all of europe is watching in shock as the second continental great power has fallen to the revolutionary chaos that began in Spain. What the future holds for France remains to be seen ...
Pour le roi et le pays!
The French Civil War

Paris has fallen. The National Assembly has declared the Republic and is now rallying troops to advance against the monarchists who have fled the city. The nobility and clergy have sided with the royalists, mobilizing their own forces in an attempt to contain the republican uprising. Meanwhile all of europe is watching in shock as the second continental great power has fallen to the revolutionary chaos that began in Spain. What the future holds for France remains to be seen ...
Vive la révolution!
Join the Revolution?

Civil War in France - Monarchists and Republicans have now gone to war as it becomes clear that no agreement could be reached. The Revolutionaries within our realm have armed themselved and support the French Republic, rallying against our forces..
The Republicans overwhelm the nobility!
The Revolt is put down!
Join the Revolution?

Civil War in France - Monarchists and Republicans have now gone to war as it becomes clear that no agreement could be reached. The Revolutionaries within our realm have armed themselved and support the French Republic, rallying against our forces..
The Republicans overwhelm the nobility!
The Revolt is put down!
The Future of Sardinia

The newly established Neapolitan Republic has invited us to join the Sicilian Federation. As a sister republic of Naples, many feel that we should accept this offer and align ourselves with the rest of Italy. However, we can just as well safeguard our independence and find our own destiny in this world.
We value our ideals
We value our independence
The Crisis of the Zhou

The Chinese Empire under the ruling Zhou Dynasty has enjoyed great prosperity for the past 167 years. But as time moves on, old agreements and power structures have led to widespread corruption and an extremely decentralized state. Wu Sangui's victory over the Qing was only possible with the aid of the Yue, Hui and Oirats, leaving them many freedoms and privileges that undermine the imperial administration for decades now. Furthermore, the continued existence of the Tungning state in Taiwan keeps delegitimizing the Zhou Mandate and might act as a catalyst for a greater crisis. If not taken care of, the mighty Zhou might face their downfall soon...
The Mandate is ours.
The Fall of Malacca!

The City of Mallaca has fallen. With the central authority in shambles, regional war lords and sultans have taken up the responsibility of restoring order to the sultanate. While Cymric dominance over the area fades as quickly as it has emerged, the division and instability that follows the break up will have a profound impact upon the trade and prosperity of the region. What the future holds for Malaysia, remains unknown...
Johor will restore order!
The Khmu Uprising!

Vientiane has been a troubled kingdom ever since the division of Lan Xang. Following the initial separation in 1707, Champassak seceded from the kingdom in 1713 after a successful revolt. Bureaucratic stagnation, high taxation of the natives, warfare with its neighbours and an ever growing Siamese threat, combined with the laotian push to assimilate the various tribal groups have finally led to a peasant uprising in the countryside. If not dealt with, this might very well mean the end of the Kingdom of Vientiane.
Vientiane falls to the rebels!
The Rebellion is crushed!
The Ambrosian invasion of Montferrat

After the Ambrosian Revolution, the captains of the new republic sought to incorporate the Duchy of Montferrat. This has however sparked a massive wave of nationalist sentiment across the small nation, with people openly calling for resistance to the invader. While war seems to be the only way to retain independence, the unequal balance of strength makes it look like a pointless wast of human lives, which could be avoided with a painful but necessary capitulation.
There is no way we can prevail.
War it is, then!
The Sofian Council

As the recently ignited Ionian Revolution ravages through our coastal lands, it effectively leavt our european possession in anarchy. This led to a provisional government being proclaimed in Sofia - while still unorganized, if we don't crush the Ionian Revolt soon, this may very well escalate into yet another conflict and a possible civil war within our realm.
Ji bo împaratorî!
The Bulgarian Secession

As anarchy reigns supreme in the balkans, the bulgars have now managed to gain full control of our european possessions. With our administration gone, the only way to regain control is through military means. Already are the bulgars assembling an army, preparing to fiercly resist and defend their newly won independence!
The Empire is indivisable!
Towards the glory of Bulgaria!
The Ionian Revolution!

These are dire times for the Roman Sultanate. As nationalist and liberal agitation divides europe, our empire too suffers from internal divisions. What started as a minor uprising in Ionia against the Sultan's autocratic rule quickly escalated into a republican and anit-roman revolution. While the region of Pontus has been pacified, our divided attention left much of Rum proper to the revolutionaries. It is uncertain how the Venetians or the Moreans will react to this recent development, but one thing is certain: If we fail to contain this revolt, this uprising could quickly spiral out of control and bring about the end of the Roman Sultanate.
Allah is with us!
Aromanian Schooling Proposal

The Romanian government came forth with a proposal to establish schools in our territory for the local Aromanian minority. While accepting the proposal would give us the chance to increase the literacy of our subjects, this could just as well lead to the development of a sense of nationality that could have unforeseen consequences on our national integrity. Refusing the proposal however would severely hurt our relations with Romania.
Give it a go.
They are better off learning Greek instead!
Aromanian Schooling Proposal Refused!
The proposal we've sent fell upon deaf ears. They refused us to educate the Aromanians, probably with the intention of further marginalizing and oppressing them!
Damnit
The Illyrian Spring

The Illyrian Movement is a pan-slavic movement that emerged in the early 19th century spearheaded by the intellectual elite of Zagreb. While initially just a minor academic circle, it has gained widespread support amongst leading Croats, Serbs and Slovenes following the Spanish Revolution. Leading Illyricists argue for the unification of Croatia and Serbia to secure our future, however, there is also a smaller fringe of Illyricists who argue that in fact, all south slavs count as one nation and must be united under a single yugoslav state.
We shall be the vanguard of the Illyrians!.
We shall be the vanguard of the Yugoslavs!
The Illyrian Revolution

The disintegration of Anatolian authority in the balkans has led to widespread revolutionary activity in the region. Within the Belgrade Governate, various nationalist figureheads have called for open revolt against the Shah and demand the immediate unification of Serbia with Croatia to form a united Illyrian Kingdom. It remains to be the seen how the Croatian King will react to these developments.
Towards Illyria!
We cannot risk a war with the Shahdom!
The Unification of Illyria

The Illyrian government has sent us a proposal that would merge Serbia and Illyria into a single Illyrian Kingdom. While this country would give is a better chance of survival we would effectively give up our national sovereignty.
At last we are one!
To hell with Illyria, Serbia shall remain free!
The Serbians Refuse!
The Serbian government has refused our generous proposal of unification. While they are clearly deluded, bringing them into the fold by force could lead to unforseen consequences.
Let them be.
We will not back down now!
The Unification of Illyria

The Illyrian government has sent us a proposal that would merge Hercegovina and Illyria into a single Illyrian Kingdom. While this country would give is a better chance of survival we would effectively give up our national sovereignty.
At last we are one!
To hell with Illyria, Hercegovina shall remain free!
The Hercegovinans Refuse!
The Hercegovinan government has refused our generous proposal of unification. While they are clearly deluded, bringing them into the fold by force could lead to unforseen consequences.
Let them be.
We will not back down now!
The Great Fire of Caerloyw!

What started as a minor fire in Aled's Bakery near Ysfael street at around 9 pm on sunday has quickly spread throughout much of the city, engulfing much of Rhun district by 9 pm on monday. From there, the fire managed to cross the Hafren, engulfing the districts of Ceri and Dafydd and forcing the government to relocate to Bryste. By Thursday, the fire has largely run its course, leaving over 80% of the city in ruins. A bigger disaster than the Great Fire of Lerpwl in the year of 1624, the remaining administration of Caerloyw requires immediate assistance to help manage the flood of refugees and rebuild the city as fast as possible.
A tragedy! They will have our aid.
Stuff breaks, people die.
The Grand Capitol

In the aftermath of the Great Fire of Caerloyw, talks have arisen within the government to permanently relocate parliament to a different city. With the City of Caerloyw being reconstructed for many years to come, many have adviced to move the seat of government to Aberlune, the historical center of Urien's Kingdom of the North and a symbolic city for the people of Ystrad Clud. Hosting a large port and direct access to the Irish Sea, it will make it easier for us impose our authority over our Irish possessions. Alternatively, there are strong points to move the capital to Llundain, located on the Tafwys River. It used to be the heart of the Anglian and Norse Kingdoms and would make it easier for us to manage our Germanic subjects in the east. Lastly, simply moving back to Caerloyw might be the easiest thing to do.
Caerloyw will always be our capital.
Llundain will make for an excellent new capital.
The Hen Ogledd shall be the center of Prydain once more!
The Baltic Uprising

As the spirit of nationalism and liberalism keeps on spreading throughout europe, it seems to now have finally reached the Baltics as well. Having been pacified in 1295 following the final Prussian uprising, the Hansa gradually expanded North East, culminating in the 1411 partition of Lithuania between the League, Poland and Ruthenia. However, the native Baltic populace has taken up arms against German rule once more, this time under the leadership of the Latgale and Lithuanians. Though Curonia and Estonia remain loyal to the League, this war may very well determine the future of the Baltics as a whole.
It's time for another Baltic crusade!
For the freedom of Latgale and Latvija!
For the glory of the Grand Duchy of Lithuania!
The Estonian Secession

Taking advantage of the chaos in the Baltics, a group of Estonian nationalists, supported by Finnish volunteers, have successfuly seized Tallinn and proclaimed the Estonian Republic! Although this new state doesn't have popular support amongst the peasantry, the Estonian nobility and clergy have given their support for this new state. This seems like the end of the Baltic Federation.
Prussia will restore order to these lands!
For the freedom of Estonia!
The Comintern

Workers of the world! The proletariat has seized the Russian state and has now fully dedicated itself towards the liberation of our fellow workers abroad. No longer shall the working class be subject to the terror and exploitation of the Ancien Régime and Bourgeoisie! The Comintern will lead the communist movement from now on and guide us towards the kingdom of liberty!
Russia will show you the way!
Comintern Influence

The communists in Russia have declared that they will do anything in their power to overthrow our government. The free nations of the world must stand together and fight against the communist outbreak that tries to undermine us. We must not allow for this bolshevik chaos to spread abroad.
Our people surely won't fall for this nonsense
Join the USSR?

We have been offered a membership in the USSR by the supreme soviet of the union. Joining would certainly strengthen the international cause of the proletarian, however, our nation would fully give up its independence and submit to the new central authority of a foreign nation.
We would prefer to remain independent
Workers of the world, unite!
Ionian Revolution reaches Morea!

As the civil war in anatolia rages on, the ideals of the Ionian Revolution seem to have taken roots within our nation now as well. Dissatisfied with the autocratic government many of our peasants have begun to rise up in the country side, refusing to pay taxes which in turn only worsens our already disfunctional economy. Following the widespread unrest, a group of liberals has taken it upon themselves to "restore order" to the nation, promising reforms and the unification of all greeks into a single country. If we don't act quickly, this revolution could very well lead to the final collapse of the roman empire.
Dissolve their government and execute the traitors!
We must accept their legitimacy. Long live Greece!
The Imperium is no more - Long live the Republic!
The Hellenic Constitution

Following the collapse of the empire, the new parliament has effectively taken control over most of hellas. The themes, while still largely independent, acknowledge the recent events and recognize our government as legitimate, showing their dedication towards the cause of unifying all of greece. The constitution that parliament has put forth is clearly inspired by the Spanish Declaration of the Republic, having a distinct Liberal character. Once accepted the Roman Empire would cease to exist - instead a new Greek Federation would rise in its place.
This is a new beginning for Greece.
Order Restored

It took many weeks but the final pockets under Ionian control have finally been recaptured. The themes have reported that they are once again in full control of their respective territories, bringing an end to the off-spring of the Ionian revolution that has plagued our empire. With parliament crushed and imperial authority restored, we have now once again a legitimate claim to all our territories.
Long may the empire live.
Rejoin Greece?

The greek authorities have proposed a reform of the theme system. Said proposal would put all themes under direct control of the government and officials would from now on be elected to represent the interests of each theme in the newly formed parliament. We would effectively give up our authority and be fully integrated into Greece.
For Democracy and Hellas, we accept.
We are better off on our own!
Reform the Themes?

The morean authorities has proposed a reform of the theme system. Said proposal would put all themes under direct control of the government and officials would from now on be appointed directly by the emperor, effectively removing us from governing ourselves.
For the Empire and Hellas, we accept.
We are better off on our own!
The Cult of Athena

These are hard times for Greece. The once great empire is no more, reduced to a decentralized rump state centered in Mystras. Poverty, war and revolutionary unrest left many people disillusioned. In these harsh times people abandon God or even worse: adopt heretical beliefs. Many think that our current situation is a punishment by the old Gods for following a false faith. While just a minor cult as of right now, it has found widespread support amongst the aristocrats and higher ups of our theme. If we don't act soon, this blatant heresy could spread across the entirety of greece...
There is only one God!
Maybe the old Gods will help us...
Fate of the Andes

With the Kingdom of Spain being no more, the authority of the empire has effectively ceased to exist. While we do not recognize the authority of the new Spanish Republic, the absence of a king seriously undermines our legitimacy as a nation. Monarchist have proposed to crown the current viceroy to reign as emperor over the andes. Alternatively, republicans within our nation urged us to recognize the Spanish Republic and to embrace the Pan-Colombian ideals in hope of ending the current war.
Proclaim the Picchunic Empire!
Proclaim the Peruvian Republic!
Rise of Khmeria

For too long has our mighty nation been subject to foreign empires. The time has come to reform our pity kingdom and to re-establish the old empire. We must bring all Khmer outside of our lands back into the fold and establish ourselves as a permanent nation in Indochina. Only then can we begin to take the first steps towards reuniting the old empire.
Very well
The Second Ambrosian Republic

Following the Spanish Revolution many republicans of Milan, joined by a large crowd of unhappy peasants, took it to the streets to protest against the autocratic government despite the ban on public meetings. When the police forces tried to dissolve the gathering, the violence escalated and the angry crowd stormed the duke's palace, publicly hanging the royal family and many of their loyalists. Following these events a provisional government of twelve "Captains and Defenders of Liberty" was elected, proclaiming the Second Ambrosian Republic. Although just a minor republic in northern Italy, many patriots and republicans see this as the first step towards a unified Italian state.
Lunga Vita alla Rivoluzione
Ratify the Declaration of Independence

Although many initially doubted that Colombia could survive as an independent nation, we have now managed to push the Spanish out of Venezuela and Central Colombia, even occupying Quito and Panama. Our brave army now marches into the Andes and Brazil, fighting for the liberty of our brothers. Let us ratify our declaration of independence by the new congress and show the world that we are a true and free nation in this world!
¡Por el triunfo de la Unión!
The Colombian Constitution

It took many months but the Congress of Caracas finally proposed the final draft of the constitution. This constitution would guarantee a free press, freedom of assembly, universal voting rights and equality between all states of the union. This constitution would certainly boost the morale of our people, however, many high ranking officials and conservatives fear that accepting the constitution during times of war could lead to unwanted internal unrest and instead propose to delay the ratification post-war.
Colombia must be free!
Colombia must be glorious!
Death of a Dream

The Revolution has failed. With North and South Colombia unable to connect, both territories become separate nations and the people of the Andes remain under the Feudal institutions the revolution tried to abolish. As the Kapuyan Republic loses its legitimacy, so do people begin to question to the legitimacy of Colombia. Reactionary forces are advocating for rejoining the Spanish Motherland while more Liberal factions try to promote a North Andean Federation. While regional differences grow and the future remains uncertain, one thing becomes clear: The Dream of a Pan-American nation in the New World is dead.
This marks the birth of a new nation.
Ecuador secedes from the Union!

After the secession of Panama, Separatist crowds have gathered in Qutio, demanding for the restoration of the independent Republic of Quito. When our armed forces intervened, the violence escalated and our troops were overwhelmed. With the province in anarchy, a group of conservatives formed a provisional government and proclaimed the Republic of Ecuador!
Let them go.
The Union must live on!
Civil War in Colombia!

With both Ecuador and Panama seceding from the Union, militias in Bogota have now taken it upon themselves to free our central provinces from the government in Caracas. With our armed forces occupied elsewhere, we were unable to keep order and thus the officials in Bogota now proclaimed the Republic Cauca. This seems like the end of the Union.
Death to the traitors!
The Republic of Platinea
As the revolution failed it becomes clear that we can no longer rely on the North for support. We must go our own path and find prosperity by our own means. Long live the Platinean Republic!
We are on our own.
The Capital of Colombia

Although our nation failed to unite all Hispanics of America, we still managed to liberate the Northern Andes and Charrua. Now that we are at peace, the time has come to deal with our internal matters. The question of what city should be the Colombian capital was delayed until the war was over since it was never certain if Morelia and Montevideo would join the union. Since we are limited to the Northern Andes now, we have 4 options for our future capital:
Caracas, the birthplace of the Colombian nation!
Bogota, our most populous city!
Quito, the most fortified city!
Colombus, a new city for all Colombians!
The Capital of Colombia

The revolution was successful and the Spanish yoke is finally overthrown. Colombians across the new world celebrate the foundation of our new nation. However, the capital question remains open since the initial constitution never specified a city since it was never guaranteed that Morelia and Montevideo would join the union. Since we united all of Gran Colombia, we have 5 options for our future capital:
Caracas, the birthplace of the Colombian nation!
Morelia, the capital of the old Purepecha Empire!
Montevideo, the city of wealth and prosperity!
Guatemala, the birthplace of the American revolution!
Colombus, a new city for all Colombians!
The Swedish-Danish Border Treaty

We received a proposal from the Swedish ambassador early this morning. Apparently the Swedish government is open to negotiate the border between the United Kingdom and Sweden. For the most part it the current border would remain in effect with only a few towns and villages being exchanged. Furthermore the Swedish embassy proposed that if we drop our claim on Øst-Trøndelag, the Swedish government in return would ratify our ownership over Göteborg. This would greatly boost our diplomatic relations in the future and open up further negotiations concerning Scandinavia, however, many in the world might see this as a weakness since we would give up a large chunk of land to the swedes.
